Attacks.Name: Thunderous Roar
Attacks.Effect: This attack emits a powerful roar that deals damage and causes the target to gain the Stunned condition. If a wild is rolled, nearby enemy characters within range 2 of the target also suffer -1 to their next attack roll due to the disorienting roar.

Attacks.Name: Volt Tackle
Attacks.Effect: Raging Bolt charges at the target with electrified force, dealing damage and if a wild is rolled, applying the Paralyzed condition, preventing the target from moving during their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Dragon's Wrath
Attacks.Effect: A fierce dragon-type energy attack that deals massive damage. If a wild is rolled, it also causes the Burn condition, dealing additional damage over time.

Superpowers.Name: Storm Summoner
Superpowers.Effect: Generates a localized storm around Raging Bolt, increasing its defense by +2 dice and causing enemy characters within range 3 to suffer -1 to their defense rolls due to harsh weather conditions.

Superpowers.Name: Lightning Speed
Superpowers.Effect: Raging Bolt can immediately make a move action. This superpower grants an additional action where Raging Bolt can either attack with a basic action or use another superpower.

Attacks.Name: Electro-Draco Burst
Attacks.Effect: A devastating combination of electric and dragon energy that explodes on impact, dealing damage to all enemies within range 2 of the target. If a wild is rolled, all affected characters are both Paralyzed and Burned.

Superpowers.Name: Eternal Storm
Superpowers.Effect: Enhances Storm Summoner effect, granting Raging Bolt an additional +1 to attack rolls and causing enemy characters to lose 1 power if they start their activation within range 3 of Raging Bolt. This superpower can be used only once per game.
